entry.def: Aftercare is the nursing and care of people who have been treated in hospital, and who are now recovering.

example.ex: As part of the treatment, he attended 15 weeks of aftercare...
example.tran: 作为治疗的一部分，他接受了15个星期的病后护理。

example.ex: Mr Lloyd specialised in aftercare services.
example.tran: 劳埃德先生专门从事病后护理。
